Title: 36910 - # Ways to Keep Remote Employees More Connected
Direction: 675 Words; This article will discuss 4-8 to keep remote employees connected. This may include using skype or other computer applications, apps for the iPhone, or even log in tracking software to monitor the work of remote employees. Make sure to naturally include the anchor text when discussing iPhones. This article should be directed toward people who own a business or work in Human Resources.
Client Comment: Example of Anchor Text That Meets Requirements: faster, better, and powerful iPhone 5c from T-Mobile

Title: 36911 - Top # Smartphone Apps for Beach Bums
Direction: 675 words; List 4-8 iPhone apps that can benefit people who often go to the beach. These apps may include advanced weather reports, traffic information, hotels or house information, and alerts about tide warnings or other dangers. This article should be directed toward people who live near the Atlantic Ocean specifically in the Carolinas. Make sure the apps are all relevant for iPhone with a natural link the anchor text.
Client Comment: Example of Anchor Text That Meets Requirements: a pre-owned iPhone 5 from T-Mobile offers a cheaper option
